code: import{getRoomsMessages}from"../util/message_api_util";export var RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES="RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES";export var BEGIN_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES="BEGIN_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES";export var FAIL_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES="FAIL_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES";export var NEW_LOCAL_MESSAGE="NEW_LOCAL_MESSAGE";export var beginReceiveRoomMessages=function beginReceiveRoomMessages(){return{type:BEGIN_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES};};export var failReceiveRoomMessages=function failReceiveRoomMessages(){return{type:FAIL_RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES};};export var receiveRoomMessages=function receiveRoomMessages(messages){return{type:RECEIVE_ROOMS_MESSAGES,messages:messages};};export var newLocalMessage=function newLocalMessage(message){return{type:NEW_LOCAL_MESSAGE,message:message};};export var fetchRoomMessages=function fetchRoomMessages(name){return function(dispatch){dispatch(beginReceiveRoomMessages());getRoomsMessages(name).then(function(messages){return dispatch(receiveRoomMessages(messages));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch(failReceiveRoomMessages());});};};
